column3: News;Phnom Penh: There was quite a surprise at 8 pm on 9 January 2019 in front of Svay Rieng Road
column7: after a man was found in the sewers
column8: where he’d been for several days.------People said that before the incident
column9: they were riding a motorbike across the street
column10: suddenly heard an unidentified voice ring out from the sewer and  hands reaching out. The witness stopped and looked into the sewer
column11: and he saw that man was hiding in there. More people came to assist
column12: and the sewer was opened and the man came out.------After getting out of the sewer
column13: the man said that he had been in the sewers for 10 days
column14: and every time he was hungry. Afterwards
column15: he was sent to the hospital for a night’s stay.------People who see the incident wondered how the man had entered the sewage pipe
column16: because the top was firmly shut. ------https://www.amapapa.news/2019/01/blog-post_318.html?fbclid=IwAR0BgJ77ni0A9Ngp3whPTTvvVaNxOm-PugvdhOpG13tXrBJ4kjrd1H475RA
